comments:
On MacOS only
- new java project, give name, hit OK,
- select New > Examples > SWT > Simple Text Editor, leave all values unchanged, hit OK,
- select New > Examples > Swing > SimpleTextEditor, leave all values unchanged, hit OK, (the order is important: the issue will not occure if I open the Swing dialog first)
- VE shows a small red cross instead of the expected dialog, and the log contains the following exception:
